blur_detection.description: The receipt exhibits good clarity with well-defined text that is easily readable.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text definition is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt shows good contrast between the black text and white paper background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No enhancement needed as contrast is sufficient for automated text extraction.

glare_identification.description: The receipt shows minimal glare that does not significantly impact text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as existing lighting conditions are adequate.

water_stains.description: No visible water stains or water damage detected on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No restoration needed as document is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows noticeable wrinkles and creases throughout the paper that may affect some text recognition.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Consider digitally smoothing the creases or using an algorithm that can compensate for wrinkled paper.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt appear to be fully captured with no cut-off content.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No adjustment needed as document boundaries are complete.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, subtotal, service charge, and total sections intact.
missing_sections.recommendation: No additional capture needed as document structure is complete.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other objects obstruct any part of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as document is free from obstructions.
